vlive.korean: 나의 눈물 버튼은? What makes you cry? 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤, 귀여운 2인 1조 TMI 인터뷰 #스타로드 05
제가 눈물 버튼입니까? Why am I a crybaby? 듣기 View video OSEN : Golden Child 골든차일드, 치킨 100마리도 먹을 것 같은 식성 #스타로드 09
"골든차일드 멤버들 중 눈물 버튼 멤버가 있다면?'" "Is there a crybaby among Golden Child members"? 듣기 View video OSEN : Golden Child 골든차일드, 치킨 100마리도 먹을 것 같은 식성 #스타로드 09
vlive.english: "Is there a crybaby among Golden Child members"?

vlive.korean: 그리고 '너무 귀여워서 눈물 난다 겸댕이들' 뭐 여러 가지... And "You're so cute that I'm crying, cuties." Various... 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: And "You're so cute that I'm crying, cuties." Various...

vlive.korean: [반토막난 말처럼 내 심장은 두 동강... 내 눈물은 대동강...] 알겠지~? [My heart is cut in half and my tears form a river] See? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [(G)I-DLE] 내 비밀번호는 sjsj486이야 수진수진 사랑해..🍒 (SOOJIN talking about tattoo on her hand)
vlive.english: [My heart is cut in half and my tears form a river] See?

examples.korean: The child was in floods of tears. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 아이는 눈물을 펑펑 흘리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The child was in floods of tears. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The tears welled up in his eyes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 두 눈에 눈물이 그렁그렁해졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The tears welled up in his eyes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His eyes grew misty as he talked. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 말을 하면서 눈에 이슬[눈물]이 맺혔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His eyes grew misty as he talked. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We had a tearful parting at the airport. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 공항에서 눈물의 작별을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We had a tearful parting at the airport. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She dabbed her eyes and blew her nose. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 눈을 몇 번 눌러 (눈물을) 닦고 코를 풀었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She dabbed her eyes and blew her nose. Add to Wordbook
